title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Blended Mathematics Instruction Design Based on Digital Learning and Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants can design real-time formative assessment activities using digital platforms (Google Classroom, KakaoTalk Open Chat).

Participants can develop two or more instructional material sets combining 5–10-minute explanatory videos on three or more math concepts (e.g., fractions, equations, geometry) and interactive Google Form worksheets (with five+ items) in a blended learning environment (online+offline) within a six-month course, achieving an 80%+ suitability score in peer and expert reviews.

Participants can build a mobile-accessible (smartphone/tablet) auto-grading system using Python/Django within six months, grade three question types (multiple-choice, short-answer, true/false) with 90%+ accuracy, and develop a three-tier personalized feedback routine (immediate feedback → weekly report → supplementary material recommendation) based on learner-specific error pattern analysis.
Participants analyze digital learning data to provide customized supplementary materials (math problem banks) for individual learners.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
